subject: Speedskating
lead_paragraph: Yu Jing of China set a world record for 500 meters at 36.94 seconds and took second in the 1,000 to win the world sprint speedskating championship in Calgary, Alberta.
snippet: Yu Jing of China set a world record for 500 meters at 36.94 seconds and took second in the 1,000 to win the world sprint speedskating championship in Calgary, Alberta.
